# isTracking

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the control is currently tracking touch events.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isTracking: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

While tracking of a touch event is in progress, the control sets the value of this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. When tracking ends or is canceled for any reason, it sets this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Tracking touches and redrawing controls

- **beginTracking(_:with:)**: Notifies the control when a touch event enters the control’s bounds.
- **continueTracking(_:with:)**: Notifies the control when a touch event for the control updates.
- **endTracking(_:with:)**: Notifies the control when a touch event associated with the control ends.
- **cancelTracking(with:)**: Notifies the control to cancel tracking related to the specified event.
- **isTouchInside**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a tracked touch event is currently inside the control’s bounds.
